alert.note: Alert for Brown; Manitowoc (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 6:30PM CDT until April 12 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BROWN AND NORTHWESTERN MANITOWOC COUNTIES... At 630 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bellevue Town, or 8 miles southeast of Green Bay, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Green Bay, Denmark, Bellevue Town, De Pere, Bellevue, Allouez, Ledgeview, Morrison, Humboldt and Glenmore. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
